plot.content:
This plot reveals a new generator called "Field". The primitive presented here is the use of a spiral from which lines are thrown on a noise field. This plot had a glitch where some frames miss some lines which created the interesting and unplanned disappearing effect. More reveals soon!

The physical is a grid of 4x2 frames that can be used to produce a 8 frames loop video.

As always, it's by making a lot of prototypes that we can verify plotting constraints. I take this opportunity to share a series of reveals that will show main features of "Plottable Field (8 frames)" – my next plottable generative art on fx(hash) platform.

prev.content:
This plot reveals a new generator called "Field". The primitive presented here circles packing combined with a strong noise field. More reveals soon!

The physical is a grid of 4x2 frames that can be used to produce a 8 frames loop video.

As always, it's by making a lot of prototypes that we can verify plotting constraints. I take this opportunity to share a series of reveals that will show main features of "Plottable Field (8 frames)" – my next plottable generative art on fx(hash) platform.
